name: No One Man
description:
Keyboard Controls: Move (WASD/Cursors), Jump (Space), Dash (J), Restart (R), Skip Dialogue (Enter)

Gamepad Controls: Move (Left Thumbstick/D-Pad), Jump (X or A), Dash (O or B), Restart (Options or Start), Skip Dialogue (X or A)

No One Man is a prototype for a puzzle platformer based on the theme of 'power' and using the limitation of having no more than 5 colours shown on the screen at a given time. Follow Mr. Green in his pursuit of power.

This prototype was created for Mini Jame 73: Power.
